thread.title: F1 legend Lauda wins race for Niki airline

title: F1 legend Lauda wins race for Niki airline
text:
F1 legend Lauda wins race for Niki airline 10:32pm IST - 01:28 
Former motor racing champion Niki Lauda has won the bidding for the Niki airline he founded, convincing the insolvent carrier's administrators to undo an agreed deal with British Airways owner IAG. Kate King reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Former motor racing champion Niki Lauda has won the bidding for the Niki airline he founded, convincing the insolvent carrier's administrators to undo an agreed deal with British Airways owner IAG.
